Publications

SUMMARY

The lab has published 34 articles, receiving 1824 citations as of January 16, 2024. You can receive notifications of any new publication via the Principal Investigator’s Google Scholar.

LIST OF PUBLICATIONS

The names in bold highlight the researchers who have contributed to publications as part of the Luque lab.
